title: Going Digital on a Budget: 16 Must-Know IT Tools for South East Asian SMEs
content:
97% of businesses in Southeast Asia are SMEs — but limited budgets, lean IT teams, and manual operations continue to hold many back from digital transformation.
NRI Indonesia analyzed 128+ tech solutions to uncover the 16 most practical, affordable, and adaptable tools that can truly move the needle for small and mid-sized enterprises in the region.
From ERP and CRM to local automation tools, our latest report highlights what works — and why.
Explore which tools are shaping the future of SME tech in Southeast Asia.
